attributes.action: Lift the ban on gay men donating blood, especially now more than ever
attributes.additional_details: At a time like this its crucial more and more blood donars donate but we could have more blood donors available by lifting the ban on gay men
attributes.background: Its absolutely ludicrous that gay men are not allowed to donate blood, allow gay men to be screened and if their blood is clean let them donate just like anyone else

rejection.details:
While it's not the case that there remains a ban on gay men donating blood, there is a 3 month waiting period. You might like to sign this petition to remove that restriction:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313693
